metadata.title: CVE-2020-28590 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the Obj File TriangleMesh::TriangleMesh() functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit 92abbc42. A specially crafted obj file could lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
